recipe.title: Honey Mustard Dressing In A Jar Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; stone ground mustard ; (125 g)
½ cup ; apple cider vinegar ; (120 mL)
1 cup ; extra virgin olive oil ; (240 mL)

steps.step: Add the mustard, honey, apple cider vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper into a mason jar.
Screw the lid on tightly and shake vigorously.
The dressing can remain in the fridge for 1–2 weeks.
Pour over your favorite salad and enjoy!
